Scripts.OnLoad:
TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(TMW.L["CLEU_EVENTS"], TMW.L["CLEU_EVENTS_DESC"]) self:SetFunction(TMW.Types.cleu.Config.EventMenu)
self.SHOW_TIME = 0.5
self.Button:HookScript("OnClick", function(self) TMW.IE:SaveSettings() end)

self.text2:SetText(TMW.L["CLEU_TIMER"]) self.text2:SetWidth(self:GetParent().CLEUEvents:GetWidth() - self:GetWidth() - 35) self.setting = "CLEUDur"
TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(TMW.L["CLEU_TIMER"], TMW.L["CLEU_TIMER_DESC"]) self:SetSetting("CLEUDur")

self:SetFrameLevel(self:GetFrameLevel() + 2) -- sometimes it ends up under the type dropdown which makes half of the checkbox unclickable
TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(TMW.L["ICONMENU_CLEU_NOREFRESH"], TMW.L["ICONMENU_CLEU_NOREFRESH_DESC"]) self:SetSetting("CLEUNoRefresh")

TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetSetting("SourceUnit") self:SetTexts(TMW.L["CLEU_SOURCEUNITS"], function() if IsModifierKeyDown() then return TMW.UNITS:GetUnitInputDetailedTooltip(self) else return TMW.L["CLEU_SOURCEUNITS_DESC"] end end)
self:CScriptAdd("ModifyValueForSave", function(self, value) return TMW:CleanString(value) end)
TMW.SUG:EnableEditBox(self, "units") self:RegisterEvent("MODIFIER_STATE_CHANGED")

TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(TMW.L["CLEU_FLAGS_SOURCE"], TMW.L["CLEU_FLAGS_DESC"]) self:SetFunction(TMW.Types.cleu.Config.FlagsMenu)
self.SHOW_TIME = 0.5
self.flagSet = "SourceFlags" -- the setting name, basically self.Button:HookScript("OnClick", function(self) TMW.IE:SaveSettings() end)

TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetScale(0.9) self:SetFrameLevel(self:GetParent():GetFrameLevel()+2) self.Background:SetAlpha(0.7)
TMW:TT(self, "CLEU_CONDITIONS_SOURCE", "CLEU_CONDITIONS_DESC")
self:CScriptAdd("ReloadRequested", function() local settings = self:GetSettingTable() local SourceUnit = settings.SourceUnit
if not SourceUnit or SourceUnit == "" or select(2, TMW:GetUnits(nil, SourceUnit)).mightHaveWackyUnitRefs then self:Disable() else self:Enable() end end)
Scripts.OnUpdate: local text = TMW.CNDT:GetTabText("CLEUSource") text = text:gsub(TMW.L["CLEU_CONDITIONS_SOURCE"], TMW.L["CONDITIONS"]) self:SetText(text)

Scripts.OnLoad:
TMW:CInit(self)
self:CScriptAdd("ReloadRequested", function() TMW.Types.cleu.Config:LoadConfig() end)

self.SourceHeader:SetText(TMW.L["CLEU_HEADER_SOURCE"]) self.DestHeader:SetText(TMW.L["CLEU_HEADER_DEST"])
